sec.title: ‘Ethical Aspects of Faith and Religion in Healthcare Practice’
Guest Editors: Jean McHale and June Jones
Submission Deadline: 30 April 2012
sec.p: Manuscripts are invited on the topic of ‘ethical aspects of faith and religion in healthcare practice’ for a special issue of Nursing Ethics. The Guest Editors are Professor Jean McHale, Director of the Centre for Health Law Science and Policy, University of Birmingham and Dr June Jones, Senior Lecturer in Bioethics, University of Birmingham.
Proposals for papers are invited for this special edition. The deadline for submission is 30th April 2012.
Articles should be submitted in the usual way and clearly marked ‘special issue 2012’. Author guidelines should be adhered to (see http://www.uk.sagepub.com/msg/nej.htm).
If you require further information, please contact Professor McHale at j.v.mchale@bham.ac.uk or Dr Jones at j.jones.1@bham.ac.uk.
